caption.p: Figure S1. Changes in abundance of Festuca ovina and Plantago lanceolata during the first 15 years of climatic manipulations at BCCIL.
Text S2. Detailed methods for field survey and sample collection, AFLP genotyping and population genetics analysis.
Table S3. Selective primer combinations used in the AFLP analysis and results for AFLP phenotype scoring.
Table S4. Diversity statistics for climatic sub‐populations of F. ovina and P lanceolata at BCCIL.
Table S5. Genetic differentiation among climatic and edaphic sub‐populations of F. ovina and P. lanceolata at BCCIL.
Table S6. Pairwise genetic differentiation between climate treatment sub‐populations of F. ovina and P. lanceolata at BCCIL.
Figure S8. Graphical output from structure harvester.
